name: @absolutejs/absolute
description: A fullstack meta-framework for building web applications with TypeScript
author: Alex Kahn

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --minify --splitting --target=bun --external react --external react-dom --external elysia && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --project tsconfig.json
scripts.release: bun run format && bun run build && bun publish
